name: Guilherme Travassos
content: GHT GUILHERME HORTA TRAVASSOS, D.Sc. Professor, CNPq (1C) Researcher, FAPERJ (researcher) CNE ESE - Experimental Software Engineering Group (Leader) PESC - Systems Engineering and Computer Science Program COPPE - Institute Alberto Luiz Coimbra Institute: Graduate School and Research in Engineering UFRJ - Federal University of Rio de Janeiro Current Research Interests                               Current Research Projects                                 Courses in the Period Supervised Researchers and Students Vitae and Citation References: CNPq Lattes Platform (CV - in Portuguese)                                        Citation Indexes Editorial Board Member: Information and Software Technology (IST) - Elsevier (Associate Editor)                       Journal of Software Engineering Research and Development (JSERD) - SBC International Journal of Software Engineering and Knowledge Engineering (IJSEKE) - WorldScientific                                 e-Informatica Software Engineering Journal (EISEJ) Memberships: International Software Engineering Research Network (ISERN)                                                                    Brazilian Computer Society (SBC) Association for Computing Machinery (ACM) / Special Interest Group on Software Engineering (SIGSOFT) Postal Address and Phone numbers: UFRJ/COPPE -  Programa de Engenharia de Sistemas e Computação. Caixa Postal 68511 21941-972 Rio de Janeiro - RJ  Brazil (+55 21) 3938 8712/8698 (voice), 8676 (fax) e_mail: ght at cos dot ufrj dot br
